trans-unit.source: Allows the transformation of a set of .NET Framework types that are used in data contracts into an XML schema file (.xsd).

Use the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> class when you have created a Web service that incorporates data represented by common language runtime (CLR) types and when you need to export XML schemas for each type to be consumed by other Web services.
trans-unit.target: CLR(공용 언어 런타임) 형식으로 표시된 데이터를 통합하는 웹 서비스를 작성했을 때 또는 다른 웹 서비스에서 사용할 수 있도록 각 형식에 대한 XML 스키마를 내보내야 할 때 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> 클래스를 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: That is, <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> transforms a set of CLR types into XML schemas.
trans-unit.target: 즉, <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter>는 CLR 형식 집합을 XML 스키마로 변환합니다.

trans-unit.source: (For more information about the types that can be used, see [Types Supported by the Data Contract Serializer](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/types-supported-by-the-data-contract-serializer.md).) The schemas can then be exposed through a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document for use by others who need to interoperate with your service.
trans-unit.target: (사용할 수 있는 형식에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [데이터 계약 Serializer에서 지 원하는 유형](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/types-supported-by-the-data-contract-serializer.md).) 그런 다음 해당 서비스와 상호 운용해야 할 다른 서비스에서 사용할 수 있도록 WSDL(웹 서비스 기술 언어) 문서를 통해 이 스키마를 공개할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Conversely, if you are creating a Web service that must interoperate with an existing Web service, use the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractImporter> to transform XML schemas and create the CLR types that represent the data in a selected programming language.
trans-unit.target: 반대로, 기존 웹 서비스와 상호 운용해야 하는 웹 서비스를 작성할 경우에는 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractImporter>를 사용하여 XML 스키마를 변환한 후 선택한 프로그래밍 언어로 데이터를 나타내는 CLR 형식을 작성하면 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> generates an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> object that contains the collection of schemas.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter>는 스키마 컬렉션을 포함하는 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> 개체를 생성합니다.

trans-unit.source: Access the set of schemas through the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Schemas%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 이 스키마 집합은 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Schemas%2A> 속성을 통해 액세스할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: To quickly generate XML schema definition (XSD) files that other Web services can consume, use the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter>.
trans-unit.target: 다른 웹 서비스에서 사용할 수 있는 XML 스키마 정의 파일(XSD)을 간편하게 생성하려면 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter>를 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: Exporting Schemas Into an XmlSchemaSet
trans-unit.target: XmlSchemaSet으로 스키마 내보내기

trans-unit.source: To create an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> class that contains XML schema files, you should be aware of the following.
trans-unit.target: XML 스키마 파일을 포함하는 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> 클래스의 인스턴스를 만들려면 다음 사항을 알아 두어야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The set of types you are exporting are recorded as an internal set of data contracts.
trans-unit.target: 내보내는 형식 집합은 내부 데이터 계약 집합으로 기록됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Thus, you can call the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.CanExport%2A> method multiple times to add new types to the schema set without degrading performance because only the new types will be added to the set.
trans-unit.target: 따라서 새 형식만 집합에 추가되므로 성능을 저하시키지 않고 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.CanExport%2A> 메서드를 여러 번 호출하여 스키마 집합에 새 형식을 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: During the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%2A> operation, the existing schemas are compared to the new schemas being added.
trans-unit.target: 추가하는 새 스키마는 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%2A> 작업 중에 기존 스키마와 비교됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If there are conflicts, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 충돌이 발생하면 예외가 throw됩니다.

trans-unit.source: A conflict is usually detected if two types with the same data contract name but different contracts (different members) are exported by the same <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> instance.
trans-unit.target: 동일한 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> 인스턴스에서 계약은 다르지만(멤버가 다름) 데이터 계약 이름이 동일한 두 형식을 내보낼 경우 일반적으로 충돌이 감지됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Using the Exporter
trans-unit.target: 내보내기 사용

trans-unit.source: A recommended way of using this class is as follows:
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스를 사용할 때는 다음과 같은 방법이 권장됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Use one of the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.CanExport%2A> overloads to determine whether the specified type or set of types can be exported.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.CanExport%2A> 오버로드 중 하나를 사용하여 지정된 형식 또는 형식 집합을 내보낼 수 있는지 여부를 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use one of the overloads that is appropriate to your requirements.
trans-unit.target: 요구 사항에 따라 적합한 오버로드를 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: Call the corresponding <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 해당하는 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%2A> 메서드를 호출합니다.

trans-unit.source: Retrieve the schemas from the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Schemas%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Schemas%2A> 속성에서 스키마를 검색합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> and calls the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%28System.Type%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter>의 인스턴스를 만들고 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%28System.Type%29> 메서드를 호출합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter" /> class.
An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> that contains the schemas to be exported.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter" /> class with the specified set of schemas.
Use this overload when you have an existing <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> to which you want to add new schemas.
trans-unit.target: 기존 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>에 새 스키마를 추가하려 할 때 이 오버로드를 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: After you construct a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> with this overload, call the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%2A> method to add new types to the existing set.
trans-unit.target: 이 오버로드를 사용하여 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter>를 생성한 후 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%2A> 메서드를 호출하여 기존 집합에 새 형식을 추가합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a common language runtime (CLR) type (or set of types) can be exported.
Not all CLR types can be used in data contracts.
trans-unit.target: 데이터 계약에서 모든 CLR 형식을 사용할 수 있는 것은 아닙니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can be serialized, see [Types Supported by the Data Contract Serializer](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/types-supported-by-the-data-contract-serializer.md).
trans-unit.target: Serialize 할 수 있는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [데이터 계약 Serializer에서 지 원하는 유형](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/types-supported-by-the-data-contract-serializer.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> that contains the assemblies with the types to export.
Gets a value that indicates whether the set of .common language runtime (CLR) types contained in a set of assemblies can be exported.
<see langword="true" /> if the types can be exported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> that contains the specified types to export.
Gets a value that indicates whether the set of .common language runtime (CLR) types contained in a <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> can be exported.
<see langword="true" /> if the types can be exported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> to export.
Gets a value that indicates whether the specified common language runtime (CLR) type can be exported.
<see langword="true" /> if the type can be exported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

The following example calls the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.CanExport%28System.Type%29> method before calling the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%28System.Type%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.CanExport%28System.Type%29> 메서드를 호출하기 전에 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%28System.Type%29> 메서드를 호출합니다.

trans-unit.source: Transforms the common language runtime (CLR) type, or set of types, into a set of XML schemas.
As a recommended practice, use one of the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.CanExport%2A> overloads to determine whether the specified type or set of types can be exported.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.CanExport%2A> 오버로드 중 하나를 사용하여 지정한 형식 또는 형식 집합을 내보낼 수 있는지 여부를 확인하는 것이 좋습니다.

trans-unit.source: After calling the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%2A> method, retrieve the schemas from the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Schemas%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%2A> 메서드를 호출한 후 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Schemas%2A> 속성에서 스키마를 검색합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> (of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" />) that contains the types to export.
Transforms the types contained in the specified collection of assemblies.
The <paramref name="assemblies" /> argument is <see langword="null" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> in the collection is <see langword="null" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> (of <see cref="T:System.Type" />) that contains the types to export.
Transforms the types contained in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> passed to this method.
The <paramref name="types" /> argument is <see langword="null" />.
A type in the collection is <see langword="null" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> to transform into an XML schema.
Transforms the specified [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type into an XML schema definition language (XSD) schema.
Call the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.CanExport%2A> to determine whether the type can be exported.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.CanExport%2A>를 호출하여 형식을 내보낼 수 있는지 여부를 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: After calling the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%2A> method, the schema can be retrieved through the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Schemas%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%2A> 메서드를 호출한 후 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Schemas%2A> 속성을 통해 스키마를 검색할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="type" /> argument is <see langword="null" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> to query.
Returns the top-level name and namespace for the <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" /> that represents the top-level name and namespace for this <see cref="T:System.Type" />, which is written to the stream when writing this object.
The <paramref name="type" /> argument is <see langword="null" />.
The type to return a schema for.
Returns the XML schema type for the specified type.
An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType" /> that contains the XML schema.
The main purpose of this method is to allow anonymous types in XML schema to be represented.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드의 주요 목적은 XML 스키마의 익명 형식을 나타낼 수 있도록 하는 것입니다.

trans-unit.source: Because anonymous types do not have a contract name and namespace, they cannot be looked up using the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.GetSchemaTypeName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 익명 형식에는 계약 이름과 네임스페이스가 없으므로 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.GetSchemaTypeName%2A>을 사용하여 익명 형식을 찾을 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: This method returns the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType> definition for such types.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 그러한 형식에 대한 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType> 정의를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The types for which the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.GetSchemaTypeName%2A> method returns a valid name, this method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.GetSchemaTypeName%2A> 메서드가 유효한 이름을 반환하는 형식의 경우 이 메서드는 `null`을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="type" /> argument is <see langword="null" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that was exported.
Returns the contract name and contract namespace for the <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" /> that represents the contract name of the type and its namespace.
The <paramref name="type" /> argument is <see langword="null" />.
Gets or sets an <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions" /> that contains options that can be set for the export operation.
An <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions" /> that contains options used to customize how types are exported to schemas.
trans-unit.target: 형식을 스키마로 내보내는 방법을 사용자 지정할 때 사용하는 옵션이 포함된 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of exported XML schemas.

An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> that contains the schemas transformed from the set of common language runtime (CLR) types after calling the <see cref="Overload:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> 메서드를 호출한 후 CLR(공용 언어 런타임) 형식 집합에서 변환된 스키마를 포함하는 <see cref="Overload:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export" />입니다.
